analysis.description:
DSExec.tryExec (/unique_chucks/23/0x48946d2452e72103703ad5317c9fa7b3a3d9b5a8.sol#8-14) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:

kkkTokenSale.isContract (/unique_chucks/23/0x48946d2452e72103703ad5317c9fa7b3a3d9b5a8.sol#518-525) is declared view but contains assembly code
c in DSExec.tryExec (/unique_chucks/23/0x48946d2452e72103703ad5317c9fa7b3a3d9b5a8.sol#44-47) is a local variable never initialiazed
c in DSExec.exec (/unique_chucks/23/0x48946d2452e72103703ad5317c9fa7b3a3d9b5a8.sol#31-33) is a local variable never initialiazed

kkkTokenSale.kkkTokenSale (/unique_chucks/23/0x48946d2452e72103703ad5317c9fa7b3a3d9b5a8.sol#491-514) does not use the value returned by external calls:

kkkTokenSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0x48946d2452e72103703ad5317c9fa7b3a3d9b5a8.sol#527-579) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-kkk.transfer(msg.sender,requested) (/unique_chucks/23/0x48946d2452e72103703ad5317c9fa7b3a3d9b5a8.sol#566-568)

kkkTokenSale.finalize (/unique_chucks/23/0x48946d2452e72103703ad5317c9fa7b3a3d9b5a8.sol#583-592) does not use the value returned by external calls:

kkkTokenSale.transferTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0x48946d2452e72103703ad5317c9fa7b3a3d9b5a8.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(dst,wad) (/unique_chucks/23/0x48946d2452e72103703ad5317c9fa7b3a3d9b5a8.sol)
